# Perceptron_pypi
OneNeuron | Perceptron package

# How to use it

```python
from OneNeuron.Perceptron import Perceptron

## get X and y and then use below commands
model = Perceptron(eta=eta, epochs=epochs)
model.fit(X, y)

```
